text: Hires Root Beer was an American brand of root beer. It was manufactured by Keurig Dr Pepper. It was introduced in 1876. It was one of the longest continuously made soft drinks in the United States. As of 2023, the Keurig Dr. Pepper web page no longer lists Hires among its list of brands on the all products listing search on its website. Category:Soft drinks
title: Hires Root Beer
